revised_title: On the Consequences of Ohm's Law and the Electromotive Force in Voltaic Circuits
tldr: John Frederic Daniell discusses the consequences of Ohm's law and the electromotive force in voltaic circuits. He applies this theory to verify previous conclusions and suggests additional experiments to clarify ambiguities. Daniell also provides practical remarks on various voltaic battery arrangements and explains the principles behind his own cylindrical battery design.
